mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_comment (boardIdx, comment, writer_id, regDate, delYn) VALUES (#{boardIdx}, #{comment}, #{writerId}, NOW(), 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT c.idx, c.boardIdx, c.comment, u.username AS writerName, c.writer_id, c.regDate, c.delYn FROM t_comment c LEFT JOIN users u ON c.writer_id = u.user_id AND u.del_yn = 'N' AND u.active_yn = 'Y' WHERE c.boardIdx = #{boardIdx} AND c.delYn = 'N' ORDER BY c.regDate ASC
